## Project Planning {.smaller}

Open planning [template](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1bB05QFbjhOE-8JgKOeleO9y5RBVbkyw7Kx1zQ6-9RCw/edit?usp=sharing).

Each project member should take leadership on one part of the larger story (code and writing).

Feel free to copy this template to keep track of tasks for your group or incorporate these ideas into another system that you've already created.
